    Online Shop

    Treehouse loves to provide almonds and almond ingredients to its valued customers in the U.S. and Canada. Almonds for sale in this store are available only in quantities smaller than 1,500 pounds.

Almonds for Sale – Smaller Orders

We’ve created this almond shop exclusively for businesses and R&D teams that need various types of almond products in quantities below 1,500 pounds. Shipping available to the U.S. and Canada only.

Shipping

We’re growing the market so you can grow your business.

The Almond Project

Treehouse California Almonds and one of its third-generation almond growers are proud partners in The Almond Project, a multi-year initiative aimed at advancing more sustainable almond farming methods.

Enjoy a 10% discount when you order 6 or more

Almond Health

GMO Free

Almonds grown naturally, processed in almond-only facilities – no artificial ingredients

Heart Healthy

High in monounsaturated "good" fat, with Vitamin E – and no sodium or cholesterol

Weight Management

6 grams of protein, 3.5 grams of fiber, and 12 vitamins and minerals – per 1-oz serving

Gluten Free

100% naturally gluten free, offering you a delicious, nutritious alternative ingredient
